lyrics:
9 contributorsto thee hotties lyricsspoken word
whats up hotties its your girl megan thee stallion aka the hot girl coach aka young tina snow mrs hard on a hoe aka thee htown hottie

and i just really had to take a moment to say thank yall and i appreciate yall and i love yall and just as hard as yall go for me i always wanna go hard for yall
and just thank you thank you thank you thank you to the og hotties
thank you to the hotties that been rocking with me since i was doing shows at the strip club
doin shows at any bar any club to the big stages that we rocking right now

ima keep on puttin on for houston and yeah
